name: Kawaii Album - Kawaii Book
description:
Do you like Kawaii things? So this game is for you! Every day you get 3 free packages for you to earn new Kawaii stickers to stick to your album or exchange with friends.

• PLAY WITH FRIENDS •
In Kawaii Album you can exchange repeated stickers with friends and also ask for those stickers you don't have. Play now and invite your friends to help you to collect all the stickers as fast as possible!

• A LOT OF SITCKERS •
Playing Kawaii Album you will find several stickers, candies, animals, starfish, dogs and more! There are more than 25 pages of stickers to stick. Do not waste more time, download now to quickly complete your album.

• FEATURES •
- 100+ stickers
- 25 pages of stickers
- Rare stickers
- 3 packets of stickers each day
- Exchange stickers with friends
- Exchange stickers for extra packages
- Play with friends

Can you complete your album? Download it now and do it with your friends!
